eutros.multiblocktweaker.crafttweaker.gtwrap.interfaces

接口 ITextureArea


  • public interface ITextureArea
    Can be used for defining a custom recipe arrow.
    ZenClass:
    mods.gregtech.render.ITextureArea

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInternal

        @NotNull
@NotNull gregtech.api.gui.resources.TextureArea getInternal()

      • fullImage

        static ITextureArea fullImage(java.lang.String imageLocation)
        Get the full image at a location.

        You will most likely wish to define this in a script with #loader preinit, so the texture actually gets loaded.

        参数:
        imageLocation - The full location of the image.
        返回:
        An ITextureArea of the given image.

      • fullImage

        static ITextureArea fullImage(java.lang.String key,
                              java.lang.String imageLocation)
        Get the full image at a location.

        You will most likely wish to define this in a script with #loader preinit, so the texture actually gets loaded.

        参数:
        key - Searching key for bracket.
        imageLocation - The full location of the image.
        返回:
        An ITextureArea of the given image.

      • areaOfImage

        static ITextureArea areaOfImage(java.lang.String imageLocation,
                                int imageSizeX,
                                int imageSizeY,
                                int u,
                                int v,
                                int width,
                                int height)
        Get an area of an image at a location.

        参数:
        imageLocation - The full location of the image.
        imageSizeX - The X size of the image itself, in pixels.
        imageSizeY - The Y size of the image itself, in pixels.
        u - The X coordinate of the image to start the texture at, in pixels.
        v - The Y coordinate of the image to start the texture at, in pixels.
        width - The width of the texture.
        height - The height of the texture.
        返回:
        An ITextureArea of the area of the given image.

      • getSubArea

        ITextureArea getSubArea(double offsetX,
                        double offsetY,
                        double width,
                        double height)
        Get an area of the current ITextureArea.
        参数:
        offsetX - The offsetX relative to this image.
        offsetY - The offsetY relative to this image.
        width - The width of the image.
        height - The height of the image.
        返回:
        The new ITextureArea.
